Package org.cloudbus.cloudsim.network

Class DelayMatrix_Float

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.network.DelayMatrix_Float
public class DelayMatrix_Float
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents an delay-topology storing every distance between connected nodes
Since:
CloudSim Toolkit 1.0

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected float[][] mDelayMatrix
    matrix holding delay information between any two nodes
    protected int mTotalNodeNum
    number of nodes in the distance-aware-topology

  • Constructor Details

    • DelayMatrix_Float

      public DelayMatrix_Float​(TopologicalGraph graph, boolean directed)
      this constructor creates an correct initialized Float-Delay-Matrix
      Parameters:
      graph - the topological graph as source-information
      directed - true if an directed matrix should be computed, false otherwise

    • getDelay

      Parameters:
      srcID - the id of the source-node
      destID - the id of the destination-node
      Returns:
      the delay-count between the given two nodes
